00006  * helper base-class. helpers are the classes you can access via $this->helpername inside a view
00007  * @package kata_helper
00008  */
00009 abstract class Helper {

00023     /**
00024      * array which holds all relevant information for the current view:
00025      * [isAjax] => false (boolean, tells you if view got called with /ajax/)
00026      * [url] => Array (
00027      *       [url] => locations
00028      *       [foo] => bar (if url read ?foo=bar)
00029      * )
00030      * [form] => Array (
00031      *    (all post-variables, automatically dequoted if needed)
00032      * )
00033      * [controller] => main (name of the controller of this request)
00034      * [action] => index (name of the view of this request)
00035      * @var array

00037     public $params;

00039     /**
00040      * placeholder for the tag-templates inside the config folder

00042      */
00043     public $tags = array (
00044         'link' => '<a href="%s" %s>%s</a>',
00045         'image' => '<img src="%s" %s/>',
00046         'selectstart' => '<select name="%s" %s>',

00079     /**
00080      * constructor, loads tags-templates from config folder
00081      */
00082     function __construct() {
00083         if (file_exists(ROOT . 'config' . DS . 'tags.php')) {
00084             $tags = array ();
00085             require ROOT . 'config' . DS . 'tags.php';
00086             $this->tags = array_merge($this->tags, $tags);
00087         }
00088     }

00090     /**
00091      * construct an relative url with the base url of the framework
00092      * @param string $url url to expand
00093      * @return string
00094      */
00095     public function urlRel($url = null) {
00096         if (empty ($url)) {
00097             return $this->basePath;
00098         }
00099         if ($url[0] == '/') {
00100             return $this->basePath . substr($url, 1);
00101         }
00102         if (isset ($url[5]) && ($url[4] == ':' || $url[5] == ':')) {
00103             return $url;
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (defined('CDN_URL') && (DEBUG < 1)) {
00107             $ext = strtolower(substr($url, -4, 4));
00108             if (($ext == '.jpg') || ($ext == '.gif') || ($ext == '.png')) {
00109                 return sprintf(CDN_URL, ord($url[0]) % 4) . $url;
00110             }
00111         }
00112 
00113         return $this->basePath . $url;
00114     }
00115 
00116     /**
00117      * shortcut. this is what your are normally using everywhere inside a view
00118      * @param string $url url to expand
00119      * @return string
00120      */
00121     public function url($url = null) {
00122         return $this->urlAbs($url);
00123     }
00124 
00125     /**
00126      * construct an absolute url (including http(s)) with the base url of the framework. normally needed if you send a view via email and you need the http-part
00127      * @param string $url url to expand
00128      * @return string
00129      */
00130     public function urlAbs($url = null) {
00131         if (empty ($url)) {
00132             return $this->base;
00133         }
00134         if ($url[0] == '/') {
00135             return $this->base . substr($url, 1);
00136         }
00137         if (isset ($url[5]) && ($url[4] == ':' || $url[5] == ':')) {
00138             return $url;
00139         }
00140         return $this->base . $url;
00141     }
00142 
00143     /**
00144      * build an attribute-string of an html-tag out of an array
00145      * @param array $options the name=>value pairs to append to the tag
00146      * @param mixed $exlude null or array of attribute-names not to append (eg. when they are framework-parameters, not html-attributes)
00147      * @param string $insertBefore string to prepand
00148      * @param mixed $insertAfter string to append, or null if you want nothing appended
00149      * @return string attributes as html
00150      */
00151     public function parseAttributes($options, $exclude = null, $insertBefore = ' ', $insertAfter = '') {
00152         //maintain compatibility if options is string. ignore $exclude because it makes no sense in this case
00153         if (!is_array($options)) {
00154             return $options ? $insertBefore . $options . $insertAfter : '';
00155         }
00156 
00157         if (!is_array($exclude)) {
00158             //again, maintain compatibility
00159             if (is_string($exclude)) {
00160                 $eclude = array($exclude);
00161             } else {
00162                 $exclude = array();
00163             }
00164         }
00165 
00166         $escape = true;
00167         if (isset ($options['escape'])) {
00168             $escape = $options['escape'];
00169             unset ($options['escape']);
00170         }
00171         if (isset ($exclude['escape'])) {
00172             $escape = $exclude['escape'];
00173             unset ($exclude['escape']);
00174         }
00175 
00176         if (count($options) > 0) {
00177             $minimized = array (
00178                 'compact' => 1,
00179                 'checked' => 1,
00180                 'declare' => 1,
00181                 'readonly' => 1,
00182                 'disabled' => 1,
00183                 'selected' => 1,
00184                 'defer' => 1,
00185                 'ismap' => 1,
00186                 'nohref' => 1,
00187                 'noshade' => 1,
00188                 'nowrap' => 1,
00189                 'multiple' => 1,
00190                 'noresize' => 1
00191             );
00192             $options = array_diff_key($options, array_flip($exclude));
00193             $optionsMinimized = array_intersect_key($options, $minimized);
00194             $options = array_diff_key($options, $optionsMinimized);
00195         } else {
00196             $optionsMinimized = array ();
00197         }
00198 
00199         $out = '';
00200         foreach ($options as $n => $v) {
00201             if ($escape) {
00202                 $out .= $n . '="' . h($v) . '" ';
00203             } else {
00204                 $out .= $n . '="' . $v . '" ';
00205             }
00206         }
00207         foreach ($optionsMinimized as $n => $v) {
00208             $out .= $n . '="' . $n . '" ';
00209         }
00210 
00211         return $out ? $insertBefore . $out . $insertAfter : '';
00212     }

00214     /**
00215      * @deprecated 1.1 - 09.11.2008 not needed anymore. use url() instead
00216      * @return string
00217      */
00218     public function urlWebroot($url) {
00219         return $this->url($url);
00220     }

00222 /**
00223  * output a url with __token get parameter appended. used for xsrf-detection
00224  *
00225  * @param string $url url to add __token to
00226  * @return string url with token appended
00227  */
00228     function tokenUrl($url) {
00229         $url = $this->url($url);
00230         $token = is($this->vars['__token'],'');
00231         if ('' == $token) {
00232             return $url;
00233         }
00234 
00235         $x = strpos($url,'?');
00236         if (false !== $x) {
00237             return substr($url,0,$x).'?__token='.$token.'&'.substr($url,$x+1);
00238         }
00239 
00240         $x = strpos($url,'#');
00241         if (false !== $x) {
00242             return substr($url,0,$x).'?__token='.$token.substr($url,$x+1);
00243         }
00244 
00245         return $url.'?__token='.$token;
00246     }
00247 
00248     /**
00249      * returns initialized class of other helpers. you have to take care of initialization order!
00250      *
00251      * @param string $name name of helper you need access to
00252      * @return object
00253      */
00254     function getHelper($name) {
00255         $classname = ucfirst(strtolower($name)) . 'Helper';
00256         if (!classRegistry::hasObject($classname)) {
00257             throw new RuntimeException("Helper $name not initialized yet. Wrong initialization order?");
00258         }
00259         return classRegistry::getObject($classname);
00260     }
